title: LARGE ONE  BEDROOM ,LARGE LOFT APARTMENTS , STORAGE UNITS
posting_body: ['MLK Apartments in Las Vegas', 'Low Weekly & Monthly Rates', 'FREE Utilities', 'Free Premium Cable TV', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Additional Information:', '<URL>', 'Apartment Home Features', '-Free utilities included with apartment', '-Free premium cable TV', '-Large one bedroom apartments', '-Unfurnished apartments', '-Storage Units', '-Close to shopping', '-Large studio apartments', '-No long term lease required', '-Basketball Court', '-Sparkling swimming pool', '-Bad Credit Ok', '-High-speed wireless internet available', 'Free Siegel Reward Program', 'Earn points every time you pay your rent or refer a friend.', 'Use your points to treat yourself to', 'free rent, food, movies, gift cards', ', and much more!', 'Pet Policy', '20lb weight limit and aggressive breeds such as Pit Bulls and Rottweilers are prohibited.', 'Managed by The Siegel Group', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Pricing may include current special and is subject to change without notice.']
